<p style="text-align: center;"><img src="http://img.moehot.com/files/2016/06/06/0000/096573a8652346e5b53438446811f045.png" title="" alt="filehelper_1465206400141_4.png"/></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">喜欢哪一个就投他一票咯~~</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;; color: rgb(250, 192, 143);">⁄(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)⁄</span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;; color: rgb(250, 192, 143);">(ง๑ •̀_•́)ง</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center; white-space: normal;"><span style="font-size: 20px;"><strong>《敢达前线指挥官》</strong></span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 本次活动由</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">萌热</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">APP主办，万代、久游网、78动漫协办。《敢达前线指挥官》作为一款敢达类COC端游。具有极高的策略性，简单的操作就能体验激烈的战斗是游戏的最大特色。<br/>另外，历代敢达作品中登场的知名机体都将加入游戏的战斗，将最大化游戏玩法的策略性。<br/>《敢达前线指挥官》官网：</span><a href="http://fc.9you.com/" target="http://bbs.78dm.net/_blank"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">http://fc.9you.com/</span></a><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/><br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">比赛内容：</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">1/144比例的正版敢达模型团队赛及个人赛<br/>比赛时间：</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">2016年4月25日~2016年6月1日</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">（投稿）</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">2016</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">年</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">6</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">月</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">1</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">日</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">~2016</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">年</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">6</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">月</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">13</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">日（投票）</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">作品展示：</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">个人组和团体组优胜作品将有机会在2016年7月上海ccg展会现场展出。<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/><br/></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">重要规则：</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>本次活动分为</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">【团体组】</span><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">与<span style="color: rgb(237, 125, 49);">【个人组】</span><span style="color: rgb(68, 68, 68);">两组。<br/></span><span style="color: rgb(237, 125, 49);">个人赛仅允许1/144比例的正版万代敢达模型</span><span style="color: rgb(68, 68, 68);">参赛，RG、HG均可。可以涂装改造，但不能使用盗版模型或成套的改件。<br/><br/></span></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">【个人组】规则及奖品奖项</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>《敢达前线指挥官》模型大赛机体分组设定来源于游戏机体设定，游戏机体设定的个人组共分12个组别。<br/>为了鼓励选手们出好作品，</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">萌热</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">APP特准备了丰厚的奖品激励大家。<br/>这12个组别分别是：<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">【RX-78-2敢达组】</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">优胜奖1名，奖品为1000元人民币</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">万代</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">&nbsp;MG RX-78-2 Gundam The Origin&nbsp;</span><span style="background: white; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p><img title="" style="color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDAy!!e8e9785a49be44bfa0ada859c96cb588.png"/></p><p><img title="" style="color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">制作注意事项：<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">涂装</span><a href="http://acg.78dm.net/ct/63594.html" target="http://bbs.78dm.net/_blank"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">。<br/>单机体模型的涂装改造，不要搭配场景和地台。<br/>本次活动优胜奖作品需邮递给久游网，且不返还，如果您参加了活动则表示同意此规则。<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">个人组优胜奖网友发布荣誉证书一本</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">。</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/><img title="" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDA2!!bbbea4c4a4d74e4fb3cc3f7a06ba6218.png"/>&nbsp;<br/><br/></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">【团体组】规则及奖品奖项</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>【团体组】参赛主题为《敢达前线指挥官》“游戏原画还原”和“游戏场景还原”</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>“游戏原画还原”参照图片：</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/><img title="" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDA3!!ead8d1cc12864ec8bee1fcb4a6dc8269.png"/>&nbsp;</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><br/></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">“游戏场景还原”参照图片：</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/><img title="" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDA1!!22de3211064e4fb7aaeed13bd910d0f8.png"/><img title="" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDAz!!a99b932afbc443eaa0f0b77526af71b7.png"/><img title="" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDA3!!99dc6193afe34a9a9700e39f75e6623d.png"/>&nbsp;</span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>团体赛可多人协同完成，但作品提交及联系方式仅以开作品贴的领队ID为准。<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">【团体组】设“游戏原画还原优胜奖”1名，及“游戏场景还原优胜奖”1名，奖品各为3000元人民币奖金。<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/><br/></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">参与奖：</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>每位参与并完成作品的网友获得</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">萌热</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">APP活动勋章一枚&nbsp;<img title="" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDA1!!9ecbacac8a78464f8ffa77d3ef0026af.png"/>&nbsp;，以及游戏中对应的机体一台。<br/>团体奖选手由领队领取勋章及游戏对应机体一台。<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">所有完成作品未获奖的选手，还将有机会抽取万代HGUC新生老虎模型，一共5台。</span></p><p><img title="" style="color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; white-space: normal;" alt="blob.png" src="FLSMjAxNi8wNS8zMS8wMDA4!!a8440c7cf8bf4e3b8694e43215006e38.png"/></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">领奖及出展注意事项：</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>请大家在作品完成后，妥善保管自己的参赛作品。<br/></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">获得团体组和个人组优胜奖的选手，必须将作品邮递到</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">久游网</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">《敢达前线指挥官》游戏项目组后，再由</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">萌热</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">APP发放奖金。作品不返还。邮费由组委会负责。</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>因为本次活动主要目的是为了征集CCG展会参展展品，如果不能来参展就会对本次活动展出造成很大困扰，所以希望大家能够理解，准时将作品发到久游项目组。<br/>如果个人组优胜奖选手无法及时将作品邮递至项目组，则由该组优秀奖代替出展，所有奖品归优秀奖选手所有。如优秀奖无法出展，则由第三名代替出展获得奖品，以此类推。<br/><br/><br/></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">基本规则：</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>1</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">）</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">所有</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">萌热</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">APP注册用户均可参赛；<br/>2</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">）</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">作品需为自己制作的原创作品，不得使用代工参赛；<br/>3</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">）</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">每位选手可用多部作品参赛，必须为新作品，涂装作品可以用</span><a href="http://acg.78dm.net/ct/63594.html" target="http://bbs.78dm.net/_blank"><span style="background: white; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">素组</span></a><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">好的模型开盒参赛。<br/>4</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">）</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">不得使用任何PS手段改造作品图片；<br/>5</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">）</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">照相过程允许租借器材和场地；<br/>6</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">）</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">比赛结束前不得将作品和进度发到萌热APP以外的网站、博客（微博除外），违者取消比赛资格。<br/>7</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">）</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">活动规则随时补充<br/><br/><br/></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">作品参赛：</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;"><br/>参赛作品须在</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">2016年6月1日前</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">投稿至任务</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">。&nbsp;<br/><br/>作品</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">任务</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">需上</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">作品</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">照，</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体;">作品</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">照内容：</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">敢达前线指挥官杯参赛作品+</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体;">萌热</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif;">APP</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><br/><br/>另外组委会还将力邀多位神秘嘉宾参赛，团体组已经邀请钢弹侠模型社，更多优秀选手还在邀请中……<br/><br/><br/></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">作品完成</span></strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">：</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><br/>作品最晚在2016年6月1日晚24时完成<br/><br/></span><strong><span style="background: white; font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 18px;">作品评分：</span></strong><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><br/>活动作品</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px;">将在</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">6</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px;">月</span><span style="color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-size: 14px; background: white;"><span style="font-family:Tahoma, sans-serif">13</span></span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(237, 125, 49); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px;">日</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px;">在萌热</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">APP</span><span style="background: white; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: 宋体; fNULL<p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">啊(｡◕∀◕｡)一转眼天气就这么热了呢~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">熊宝们的暑假生活是不是已经开始啦？</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">萌热娘对夏天的一切都炒鸡期待的！不仅有强大的新番可以追，还有好多漫展要去参加(`・ω・´)~~已经迫不及待剁手买周边啦！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">你的夏天会是怎么样的呢~是像萌热娘一样执着于逛漫展面基，还是宅在家玩游戏氪金？又或是无奈地补课赶作业呢？(´･_･`)</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">不管怎么样，二次元同好们的夏天肯定不无聊！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">熊宝们就用最爱的方式记录下自己的夏日日常吧，投稿参加征集活动，只要发布四格日常的脑洞就有机会赢取丰厚的奖品啦~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><img src="http://img.moehot.com/files/2016/06/22/0007/401a2fe35849440b89114b920e390c08.jpg" title="" alt="750X360.jpg" style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"/><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><br/></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则：</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px">1、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">围绕主题“</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">夏日日常</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">”制作</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">四格创意作品</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">。</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">内容/形式不限：</span><br/></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp; 可以手绘四格</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">原创/同人漫画</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">；</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp; 可以制作类似暴漫的</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">四格段子</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">；</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp; 可以用</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">手办摆拍</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">四格剧情；</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp; 可以四格</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">剧情向cos</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">；</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp; ……</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp; 只要符合主题，脑洞随意你怎么开啦~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">3、投稿时间：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">月</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">22日—</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">7月31日</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp; 投票时间：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">8月1日</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">—</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">8</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">月</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">14日</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(164, 164, 164);font-size: 14px">&nbsp; （</span><span style="text-decoration:underline;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(164, 164, 164);font-size: 14px">投稿阶段结束后再开启投票，时间很充裕~</span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(164, 164, 164);font-size: 14px">熊宝们慢慢记录美好的日常吧</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(164, 164, 164); font-size: 14px;">ヽ(✿ﾟ▽ﾟ)ノ）</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(164, 164, 164);font-size: 14px"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">4、投票结果于</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">8月15日</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">公布，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px"></span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">投票数前三的作品将分别获得对应奖项。</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></p><h3 style="margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;line-height:21px;background:rgb(255,255,255)"><span style=";font-family:宋体;font-weight:normal;font-size:16px">5、奖品设置：</span></h3><h3 style="margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;line-height:21px;background:rgb(255,255,255)"><span style=";font-family:宋体;font-weight:normal;font-size:16px">一等奖：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;color:rgb(247,150,70);font-weight:normal;font-size:16px">MUSE木棉花正版《一拳超人》埼玉老师</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;color:rgb(247,150,70);font-weight:normal;font-size:16px">潮流T恤~</span></h3><p><span style=";font-family:宋体;color:rgb(247,150,70);font-weight:normal;font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p><span style=";font-family:&#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size:14px">&nbsp;<img src="http://img.moehot.com/files/2016/06/22/0001/9af5f9672ae9454080d0f0fea4829cc9.jpg" title="" alt="1.jpg"/></span></p><p><span style=";font-family:&#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size:14px"><br/></span></p><p><span style="line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体;">二等奖：</span><span style="line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);">艾漫原创</span><span style="line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);">锦鲤伞~</span><span style="color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 21px;">夏日晴雨遮阳两用伞</span></p><p><span style="line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);"><br/></span></p><p><span style="line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; text-align: justify; font-family: 宋体;">三等奖：</span><span style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);">《全职高手》夏日</span><span style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify; text-align: justify; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px"><img src="http://img.moehot.com/files/2016/06/22/0005/7ed44ccec81e47e0be08e7d307f27d19.jpg" title="" alt="3.jpg"/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">是不是很想要~！(✪ω✪)</span><br/></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(247, 150, 70);font-size: 16px">快来发布脑洞啦，萌热娘等你来参加哟(*´∀`)~♥</span><span style="color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></p><p><br/></p>
<p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">号外号外！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">火辣辣的夏大魔王已经顺利抵达北半球啦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">宝宝们最近是不是昏昏沉沉经常犯困呢，中午一定要记得睡午觉哦！</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">=w=此外，萌热娘还要郑重提醒各位美少女帅骚年们，睡觉时也要注意自己的卖相，可不能让狂放不羁的睡颜出卖了你们英明神武的形象，男神女神可都在偷偷注意泥萌呢(=•ω＜=)</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">当然，这些可完全困扰不到睡觉也开外挂的动漫角色们，<span style="color:#C00000">无论姿势多奔放，无论表情多清奇，我们的二次元小天使总能睡出自己的风姿</span>≡ω≡真是让人感叹颜值的重要性啊~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">你睡觉的样子真好看！想让心目中的睡颜小王子勇夺王冠？还不赶紧参加投稿，将他们最美的睡颜图展示出来，还有机会赢取丰厚奖品哦=333=</span></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="http://img.moehot.com/files/2016/07/07/0004/917888fa2af6405c9e21dbc5485cd253.jpg" title="" alt="睡颜750x360-6（文章用）.jpg"/></p><p><br/></p><p><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height: 150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">围绕“睡颜”投稿你喜欢的动漫人物睡颜图</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height: 150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">内容/形式：</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">可以<span style="color:#C00000">截取动画/漫画中的人物图</span>；也可以<span style="color:#C00000">自己绘制动漫人物睡颜图</span></span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height: 150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">注意事项：</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（1）投稿时请<span style="color:#C00000">注意标注作品及角色名</span></span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（2）</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">请不要使用</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">他人绘制的同人作品</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（3）<span style="color:#C00000">每人限投一稿</span>，请不要大意的贴上你最喜欢的睡颜图吧(●&#39;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: " ms="">◡</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&#39;●)</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, sans-serif;">ﾉ</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: " segoe="" ui="">♥</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">（4）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">已有的图片请勿重复投稿</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">，发现有相同作品萌热娘会进行删除的哦，以</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">第一次投稿作品为准。</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（5）<span style="color:#C00000">同一人物可以有多张不同睡颜图投稿</span>，我们最后的评比对象是睡颜图片而</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">非睡颜图中的人物</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp; 4</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、投稿时间：<span style="color:#C00000">7</span><span style="color:#C00000">月7日-7月28日</span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp; 5</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、投票时间：<span style="color:#C00000">7</span><span style="color:#C00000">月29日-8月8日</span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 12px;">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px;">(投稿阶段结束后再开启投票，时间很充裕，熊宝们可以慢慢寻找最喜欢的睡颜图哦~)&nbsp;</span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height: 150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">票数统计结果将于<span style="color:#C00000">8</span><span style="color:#C00000">月9日</span>公布</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height: 150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">活动共设五个奖项，分别对应票数最高的前五个投稿作品，五个作品的投稿者将获得对应奖品</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height: 150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">丰厚奖品看这边o( =•ω•= )m</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><br/></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">一等奖：《盗墓笔记》连帽U型枕</span><br/></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;"><img src="http://img.moehot.com/files/2016/07/07/0007/36651787371c4041bf569208bd90be19.jpg" title="" alt="TB285QUjVXXXXcGXXXXXXXXXXXX_!!2320666717.jpg"/></span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; <p style="margin-right:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric;text-align:center"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 19px">《SD敢达战争要塞》创意绘画大赛</span></strong></p><p rgb(237, 125, 49);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">9月16日</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:28px;text-indent:0"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:28px;text-indent:0"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 49);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">最佳周边设计奖&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;由萌热MOEHOT报送的8个作品中在决赛</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(237, 125, 49);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">得票数最高</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">的选手获得。</span></p><p font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">3000元现金+艾漫签约设计师认证*1</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:28px;text-indent:0"><span style="font-family: 0;font-size: 16px">所有决赛的入选作品还有机会争夺最佳评委人气奖，由3位嘉宾评委最终评选决定，将获得</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(237, 125, 49);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">3000元</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">的现金奖励。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:28px;text-indent:0"><span style="letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">(✪ω✪)豪华嘉宾评委阵容：</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:28px;text-indent:0"><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(237, 125, 49);letter-spacing: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:28px;text-indent:0"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="font-size:16px;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">八月的少年狮子座，剑圣、话唠、荣耀最强的机会主义者，转眼又到了每年一次为黄少庆生的日子，喜欢烦烦的你们，已经准备好为他送上一份最诚挚的祝福了吗？</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-size:16px;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;color:#EE9900">写一篇深情动人的生贺文、用笔记下你最美好的祝愿、用COS展现一个真实还原的烦烦，画出你心中最帅气的黄少天……</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-size:16px;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">最美好的祝福给烦烦！<span style="color:#EE9900">参与投稿，用你最擅长的方式将心中的爱传递出来，优秀作品还将获得萌热APP准备的精美礼物。</span>你的内心是不是已经开始骚动了呢=。=</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">感谢熊宝 </span><span style="text-indent:16px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 16px;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体"><br/></span></p><p style="text-indent:16px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-size:16px;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">征集规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">为8月10日黄少天生日送上生日祝福</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">形式/内容</span><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-size:16px;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;color:#EE9900">△所有投稿作品请确保完全由个人原创，不得使用他人画稿、文稿、COS图片，告白类投稿中不得出现他人同人作品。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（1）<span style="font-stretch: normal;font-size: 9px;line-height: normal;font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">画稿类：手绘、板绘、鼠绘……<span style="color:#EE9900">所有原创黄少天同人画稿</span>均可参加</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（2）<span style="font-stretch: normal;font-size: 9px;line-height: normal;font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">贺文类：同人文、小段子，<span style="color:#EE9900">你所有关于黄少的脑洞故事</span>都可以投在这里</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（3）<span style="font-stretch: normal;font-size: 9px;line-height: normal;font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">告白类：<span style="color:#EE9900">写下你想对黄少说的话</span>，电子版手写版都可以参加，请注意真情流露哟~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（4）<span style="font-stretch: normal;font-size: 9px;line-height: normal;font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">COS</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">类：由投稿人本人COS的黄少天、参与的相关CP、全员COS图全部符合要求哦=w=</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-size:16px;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;color:#EE9900">△投稿者请通过以上任意一种形式参与投稿，文字类请截图或拍下内容后上传图片</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">注意事项</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（1）<span style="font-stretch: normal;font-size: 9px;line-height: normal;font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(238, 153, 0);">我们坚持原创。</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">抄袭作品一经发现，投稿者取消参赛资格</span></p><p normal;font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(238, 153, 0);">每个ＩＤ限投一稿。</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(238, 153, 0);"></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">以首次投稿作品为准，多余投稿作品会被删除的哦</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（3）<span style="font-stretch: normal;font-size: 9px;line-height: normal;font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(238, 153, 0);">请保证投稿内容的健康和谐。</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">不健康的文字与画面，掐ＣＰ、恶意诋毁其它角色及有损全职高手声誉形象的行为都是明确禁止的哟~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(127, 127, 127);"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">1、&nbsp;围绕&nbsp;“二次元CP”投稿，可以是正常向，耽美，百合等。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">2、&nbsp;内容/形式：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">图片：可以</span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">截取动画/漫画中的人物图</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">；也可以</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">自己绘制CP图</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">文字：围绕最爱的二次元CP</span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">写一段文字</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">，可以是</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">原创脑洞故事，喜欢的理由，他们是最恩爱CP的证明</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">等等。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">3、&nbsp;注意事项：</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">（1）投稿时请</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">注意标注作品及角色名。</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">（2）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">请不要使用</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">他人绘制，撰写的同人作品。</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">（3）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">每人限投三稿</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">，要好好纠结自己的最爱是谁和谁哦~</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">（4）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">已有的图片和文字请勿重复投稿</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">，发现有相同作品萌热娘会进行删除的哦，以第一次投稿作品为准。</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">（5）同一对CP可以重复投稿，评比的是投稿的内容不是单纯的选CP哦，但是图片或者文字都必须积极、健康、向上。 &nbsp;如果发现有需要“哔--”的内容萌热娘会进行删除哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">4、投稿时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">8月5日-8月14日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">5、投票时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">8月15日-8月21日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(127, 127, 127); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 150%;">想让更多人知道你对这对CP的爱就要乘早表白他们哦~<br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(127, 127, 127);"><strong><span style="color: rgb(127, 127, 127); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">1、&nbsp;票数统计结果将于</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">8月22日</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">公布</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">&nbsp;活动共设三个奖项，分别对应票数最高的前三个投稿作品，三个作品的投稿者将获得对应奖品。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);"><br/></span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">更有<strong>三个鼓励奖</strong>，由萌热娘选出，送给那些有潜力，有热情的作品，三个作品的投稿者获得鼓励奖。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(127, 127, 127);">3、&nbsp;丰厚奖品看这边o( =•ω•= )m</span></p><p><img color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;">~</span>以后我会给你吃不完的瓜子！所以，和我一起玩好不好</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: &#39;Times New font-size: 14px; color: rgb(165, 165, 165);">鼓励奖：</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);">《全职高手》蜜饯系列（一套<span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;">6</span>份，口味齐全）</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);">吃着甜甜的蜜饯，看<span style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;">CP</span>秀恩爱！这个七夕单身汪们不孤单<span style="font-size: 14px; color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;">~</span></span></p><p><span style="line-height: 24px; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p><span style="line-height: 24px; font-family: 宋体;">萌热娘送你七夕礼物啦~快来拿着礼物看最爱的CP发糖吧</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 22.5px; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">&nbsp;&nbsp;♥(｡￫v￩｡)♥</span><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">七月十五，百鬼夜行，魑魅魍魉，莫能逢旃。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">月黑风高夜，小鬼放火天。又到了一年一度的中元节，二次元的妖魔鬼怪齐出动，恐吓卖萌，各显神通。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">见多识广的老妖摇着蒲扇看烟花，不善言辞的新魔上街巡查，大鬼东躲西藏想要吓坏小盆友，龇牙咧嘴的小怪显得很可爱......</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">哪里的妖魔你最喜欢，什么样的鬼怪让你想起中元节。今夏捉鬼大作战！萌热娘邀您共游二次元，捉大鬼携小怪，选出鬼节的代言鬼，赢取萌热APP赠送的精美好礼，过一个最有趣味的中元节。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8wOC8wMDA3!!b026e0c1331747278a99f6eee049e2d6.jpg" title="" alt="“捉鬼大作战”中元节捉鬼计划征集！750x360.jpg"/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">（感谢由非人哉提供的活动图片~）</span><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">请</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">认真阅读</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">哟</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">1、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">投稿你认为最符合中元节的二次元妖魔鬼怪形象</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">内容/形式</span><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">可以选择</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">动画/漫画作品中的妖魔鬼怪图</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">，也可以发挥自己的图力</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">亲手绘制</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">3、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">注意事项：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">（1）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">投稿时请注意</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">标注作品及角色名</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px;">（2）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">请不要使用</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">他人绘制的同人作品</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">（3）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">每个ID最多可投三稿。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">（4）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">已有的图片请勿重复投稿。</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">如发现重复，以首次投稿作品为准，其余删除</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">（5）最终解释权归萌热APP所有</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4、投稿时间：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">8月8日-8月20日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">5、投票时间：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">8月21日-8月30日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">票数统计结果将于</span><span style="line-height: 150%; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">8月31日</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">公布</span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">本次活动共设</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">大魔王奖、（禁欲的）妖怪助理奖和（元气的）小鬼奖</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">三个奖项，分别对应票数最高的三个投稿作品，作品的投稿者将获得对应的</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);">超·丰富·中元节礼物</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">哦</span><span style="font-family: Arial; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(17, 17, 17); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 13px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">(●′ω`●)</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">丰厚奖品看这边o( =•ω•= )m</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8wOC8wMDAx!!5b135bfaccb84dbeb286198b93b269ff.jpg" title="" alt="4.jpg"/></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">《盗墓笔记》精装笔记本麒麟笔记款</span></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8wOC8wMDAy!!17809d485f784affb50713e4e90be03c.jpg" title="" alt="5.jpg"/></p><p><span style="color: rgb(0, 32, 96);"><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px;">《</span><span style="font-family: Tahoma; letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 16px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">盗墓笔记</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 16px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">》</span><span style="font-family: Tahoma; letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 16px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">和纸胶带</span></span></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8wOC8wMDA4!!742c634c95394b4884490b8b34378bc0.jpg" title="" alt="6.jpg"/></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">《画江湖之不良人》周边毛绒抱枕</span></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8wOC8wMDAz!!bdecf5e571334bf1a421005107239401.jpg" title="" alt="3.jpg"/></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">《画江湖之不良人》周边文件夹</span></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8wOC8wMDAz!!6d746acdda8e4641aaf4dc6059e78128.jpg" title="" alt="1.jpg"/></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">《非人哉》马口铁徽章组</span></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8wOC8wMDAz!!28c2385fe6934235b16bf13669915649.jpg" title="" alt="2.jpg"/></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">《非人哉》手机挂绳</span></p><p><br/></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">大魔王奖：《盗墓笔记》精装笔记本麒麟笔记款+和纸胶带</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(0, 32, 96); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">（禁欲的）妖怪助理奖：《画江湖之不良人》周边毛绒抱枕+周边文件夹</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);">（元气的）小鬼奖：《非人哉》马口铁徽章组+手机挂绳</span></p><p><br/></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">和二次元的大鬼小怪闹鬼节，萌热·幽灵·娘正在向你招手哟</span><span style="font-family: Arial; line-height: 150%; letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 13px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">(•̀ᴗ•́)و ̑̑</span></span></p><p><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">暑假还剩下不到两周，同学，你的作业写完了吗？</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">面对着开学有人欢喜有人忧。但是最兴奋的事，应该就是期待谁是自己的同桌吧！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">你是不是曾经羡慕主角们有能有一个神一般无所不能的同桌，有或者是可以同甘共苦，共同奋斗的同桌。每次你遇到难题，同桌都会及时出现~一起打怪升级，参加社团活动，拯救世界！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">你的愿望萌热娘来帮你实现吧~告诉萌热娘你最想和谁成为同桌，在哪个学校一起学习！说不定愿望就能实现了呢~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">没有写完作业的孩子不要气馁！还有两周加油哦~</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">当然抄作业不是好孩子的行为哦~作业还是要自己认真做才能体会其中的收获↖(^ω^)↗</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">作为奖励萌热娘会送出开学大礼包哦~一定不能错过呀！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8xNi8wMDA1!!2b426f6ba7934422ac0421a78c44751c.jpg" title="" alt="开学750x360.jpg"/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">围绕</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">“</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">二次元同桌+学校”</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">投稿</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">同桌和学校</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(227, 108, 9);font-size: 21px">不必</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">出自同一部作品，脑洞越大越欢迎哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">萌热娘给你举个栗子</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">⊙ω⊙：</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">我的同桌叫</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(112, 48, 160);">叶修</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">，我们在</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 102, 255);">霍格沃茨魔法学校</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">学习魔法，我们有一个约定，要一起成为</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 102, 255);">马猴烧酒</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">！</span></strong><br/></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">再来一个栗子</span><span style="font-family: Arial;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(17, 17, 17);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 13px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)">(☆▽☆)y</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">这个学期我有了一个新同桌--</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(227, 108, 9);font-size: 16px">漩涡鸣人</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">我们是虽然是青梅竹马，但是同桌还是第一次呢！我说鸣人！说了在</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">帝光</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">篮球队用隐分身是不可以的啊~~~</span></strong></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">内容/形式：</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">图片：</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">可以</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">截取动画/漫画中的人物图</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">场景图</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">；也可以</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">自己绘制</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">图片，请务必合并成一张图片。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">文字：</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">“</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">二次元同桌+学校”</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">写一段文字</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，可以是</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">原创脑洞故事，想成为同桌的理由，想和他在这个学校的约定</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">等等。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">注意事项：</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">（1）投稿时请</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">分别</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">注意标注作品及角色名</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">。</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">（2）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">请不要使用</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">他人绘制</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">，</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">撰写</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">的同人作品</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">（3）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">每人限投</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">三</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">稿</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">，</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">满足你幻想的各种可能性哦~</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">（4）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">已有的图片</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">和文字</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">请勿重复投稿</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">，发现有相同作品萌热娘会进行删除的哦，以第一次投稿作品为准。</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">（5）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">同一人物或学校可以重复投稿，评比的是投稿的内容哦，但是图片或者文字都必须积极、健康、向上。如果发现有需要“哔--”的内容萌热娘会进行删除哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">3、投稿时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">8</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">16</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">日-</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">8</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">30</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">4、投票时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">8月31日-9月5日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:14px">开学大礼包不能错过！要抓紧投稿哟~~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">1、&nbsp;</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">票数统计结果将于</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">9</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">6</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">日</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">公布</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">2、&nbsp;</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">活动共设</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">三</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">个奖项</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">，</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">分别对应票数最高的前</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">三</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">个投稿作品，</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">三</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">个作品的投稿者将获得对应奖品</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,102);font-size:16px">。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">另有</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 14px">好好学习天天向上奖</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">由萌热娘选出，送给那些有潜力，有热情的作品，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">三个</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">作品的投稿者获得。</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">3、&nbsp;</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">开学大礼包在这里哟</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">o( =•ω•= )m</span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8xNi8wMDAz!!8d3b6224760c4184a81facdf16bd23db.jpg" title="" alt="奖品图一.jpg"/></span></p><p><strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;font-size:14px">一等奖：《盗墓笔记》套装！包括</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:14px">常规笔记本全套款<span style="font-family:Times New Roman">:</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9); font-size: 14px;">《一拳超人》原子笔</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(227, 108, 9); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;">-A款(琦)</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(227, 108, 9); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;">+B款（杰）各一支</span></strong><br/></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(227, 108, 9); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><br/></span></strong></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(227, 108, 9); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8xNi8wMDAz!!5d85dee9fdf7431a97e56bd38957c25b.jpg" title="" alt="奖品图四.jpg"/></span></strong></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(227, 108, 9); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;"></span></strong></p><p><strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;font-size:14px">好好学习天天向上奖：</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑;color: rgb(227, 108, 9);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px">呵呵我很方，再见-笔记本书签组合</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑;color: rgb(227, 108, 9);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px">*1</span></strong></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑;color: rgb(227, 108, 9);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px">脑洞大开不要方！呵呵我很方笔记本让你随时记录你下你的奇思妙想~</span></strong></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(227, 108, 9); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><br/></span></strong><br/></p><p><span style=";font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">每一个都是萌热娘精心挑选的~用了它们一定能够好好学习，天天向上，成为学校第一再也不是梦~fight哒哟！</span></p><p>点击右上角（对就是三个圆点点）就可以把活动分享给小伙伴们~一起为你加油~~</p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">总有这么一个星座，他们不经意间流露</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 153, 255);font-size: 16px">出世脱俗</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">的气质，让人闻名即想象到美好和干净。他们总是</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 153, 255);font-size: 16px">完美，理智</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">的代言人，给空气中带来丝丝清新感。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">但是，他们也有着许多你</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">不知道的一面！</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">吹毛求癖、有洁癖倾向、唠叨琐碎、不够浪漫？？？</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(255,0,0);font-size:16px">前方高能预警！！！</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">一大波</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 19px">处女座</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">正在靠近~~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">对今天萌热娘要说的就是处女座~这个集万千宠爱与万千吐槽于一身的星座！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">你是要为他们平反还是吐槽？或者对你来说这些都不能概括这个星座！快来投稿告诉萌热娘吧~你眼中的是“处女作</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">”</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">还是“处女座”呢~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;<img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8yMi8wMDAw!!a14e8d1696c34620ae77747b5bc36886.jpg" title="" alt="处女座 750 360.jpg"/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">围绕</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">“</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">我眼中的处女座”</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">投稿</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 20px">和处女座相关的任何内容</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，可以是自己经历的故事，朋友的趣事（</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">画成漫画，单幅四格看你心情~流行表情改图，动画截图小剧场，COS都是可以哒~</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">），动漫作品中的处女座人物，甚至自己画一个处女座的拟人！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">萌热娘最喜欢脑洞大又有创造力的孩子=￣ω￣=</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(112, 48, 160);font-size: 21px">接下来萌热娘又要来举栗子啦~⁄(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)⁄</span></strong></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8yMi8wMDA0!!322976de414349fdac5f042436213d4e.jpg" title="" alt="1.jpg" width="192" height="182" style="width: 192px; height: 182px;"/><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOC8yMi8wMDA1!!9dc3ff2b80cb4f3385dd538089749042.jpg" title="" alt="2.jpg"/>&nbsp;</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(112, 48, 160);font-size: 16px">追求完美，再小的细节都不会放过！这就是处女座~</span></strong></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">内容/形式：</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">图片和</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">文字皆可，贴和主题“</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">处女座</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">”，想到什么就画什么~</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">注意事项：</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（1）投稿时请</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">分别</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">注意标注作品及角色名</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（2）</span><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">请不要使用</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">他人绘制</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">撰写</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">的同人作品</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（3）</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">每人限投</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">三</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">稿</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">更加全面的说出你心中的处女座~</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（4）</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">已有的图片</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">和文字</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">请勿重复投稿</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，发现有相同作品萌热娘会进行删除的哦，以第一次投稿作品为准。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（5）</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">图片或者文字都必须积极、健康、向上。如果发现有需要“哔--”的内容萌热娘会进行删除哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">3、投稿时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">希望你的生活中不仅有</span>“呵呵”还有快乐，秉承着爱与正义的萌热娘为此特别开启</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: style="text-decoration:underline;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 80, 80);font-size: 19px"><span style="font-family:宋体"><img style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">请</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">认真阅读</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">哟</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">1、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">投稿你想</span>“呵呵”的槽心事</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">2、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">内容</span>/形式</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">（1）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 80, 80);font-size: 16px">图片类：</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">你可以绘制</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">小四格</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、制作</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">暴漫</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，也可以</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">截取动漫中的图片进行二</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">次创作</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，或者用</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">COS</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">展示。我们同样欢迎</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">其它有趣有创意的形式</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，但是请</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">确保</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">作品的原创</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">性哟~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">（2）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 80, 80);font-size: 16px">文字类：</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">你可以平铺直叙的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">记录</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，也可以将你的槽心事加工为一个有趣的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">小故事</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。请保证你的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(242, 165, 0);">故事真实原创</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，我们拒绝所有带有抄袭的作品哦。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><br/><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">3、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">注意事项：</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体;"><span style="line-height: 24px;">&nbsp;（1）</span><span style="color: rgb(255, 80, 80); font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 150%;">我们坚持原创。</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">请确保最后的投稿作品中不包含他人创作的同人图片，请勿抄袭他人文字。</span></p><p style="text-align: start; "><span style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style="font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 80, 80);">☆盗用他人同人图片、文字的投稿作品，最终所得票数不计入结果统计☆</span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">&nbsp;（2）</span><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 80, 80); font-size: 19px; font-family: 宋体;">每</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 80, 80);font-size: 19px"><span style="font-family:宋体">个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">&nbsp;（3）</span><strong><span style="color: rgb(255, 80, 80); font-size: 19px; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">请保证投稿内容的健康和谐。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">不健康的文字与图片、带有引战性质的</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">作品都是会被删除的哦。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">&nbsp;（4）</span>最终解释权归萌热APP所有</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4、投稿时间：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 80, 80);font-size:
