style="color:#ff5050;font-family:宋体"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">快来吐槽你的槽心事，赢取“呵呵”好礼吧~</span></span></p><p style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><br/></p><p><br/></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;">躲在月饼里的男神和女神，好想啊呜一口吃掉</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;">~</span></p><p style="text-align:center;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">来自神仙国的萌热娘将赋予你们神秘力量，挥舞仙女棒，将你的本命变小变软变成馅儿</span></p><p style="line-height: style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">你心目中的本命什么馅儿，正躲在中秋的月饼里伸懒腰。</span></p><p style="text-align:center;line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">选择一种你喜欢的形式，</span><span style="text-decoration:underline;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 19px"><span style="font-family:宋体">将本命与对应的月饼口味展示出来</span></span></span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">，萌热娘已经准备好了</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:19px"><span style="font-family:宋体">丰厚的中秋大礼</span></span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">，正在吃着月饼等你哟</span>~</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOS8wNS8wMDA0!!9cf2a700f22c43ce90570aada763bb2f.jpg" title="" alt="750x360.jpg"/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">请</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">认真阅读</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">哟</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">1、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">你的</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 41, 101);font-size: 16px">二次元本命对应什么口味的月饼馅儿</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">，投稿展示给大家吧</span>~ &nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">2、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">内容</span>/形式</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">（1）<span style="color:#c00000">截图</span></span><span style="color:#c00000">+说明+灵感：</span></span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">截取动画</span>/漫画中的人物图片，说明人物对应的月饼馅儿，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">并告诉我们理由（萌热娘爱心提示：图片搭配月饼更加分哟(ﾉ*･ω･)ﾉ）</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">（2）</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">绘画：</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">你可以画一只躲在月饼里的（月饼馅儿）小天使，也可以自己绘制</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">拟人，我们也欢迎其它有创意的形式，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">但是一定要记得说明人物与其对应</span><span style="line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体;">的口味哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><img src="FLSMjAxNi8wOS8wNS8wMDA3!!be183978a39346d0ba4ca49ec49de77e.png" title="" alt="图片2.png"/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">（3）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(192,0,0);font-size:16px">文字：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">变成月饼馅儿的男神女神会有什么有趣的小故事呢，放大你的</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">脑洞，可以从long long ago说起哟=w=</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">3、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">注意事项：</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 24px;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 24px;">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 24px;">1）</span></span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 24px;"></span><span style="line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 41, 101); font-size: 19px; font-family: 宋体;">我们坚持原创。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px;">请不要使用他人绘制的同人作品，请勿抄袭他人文字。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 41, 101); font-size: 16px;">☆盗用他人同人图片、文字的投稿作品，最终所得票数不计入结果统计☆</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">（2）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">希望你们在投稿时</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 41, 101);font-size: 19px"><span style="font-family:宋体">标注作品及角色名</span></span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">原创类作品除外</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">）</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">4、</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">注意事项：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span 150%;">仔细阅读，有任何疑问欢迎联系萌热娘。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: Wingdings; font-size: 19px; line-height: 28.5px;">☆</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">投稿作品</span><span Wingdings;">☆</span><span style="font-weight: bold; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(192, 80, 77);">一稿多投。</span></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">参赛作品已参加过其它活动或在投稿后参与其它活动。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: Wingdings; font-size: 19px; line-height: 28.5px;">☆</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">投稿作品</span><span font-family: 宋体;">本次活动共设</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 80, 77);">全员疯抢奖、国家队喜爱奖、值得一试奖以及心意满满奖</span></strong><span color: rgb(192, 80, 77);">前三个奖项分别对应票数最高的三个投稿作品，心意满满奖三名，将由萌热娘特别颁发。</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">获奖者都将获得对应的超丰厚礼品哟！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span 150%; font-family: 宋体;">看这边o( =•ω•= )m</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"></span><br/></p><p><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">二次元偶像</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">这个词相信大家一定不陌生。今天萌热娘就要来和大家一起聊（花）聊（痴）一下二次元偶像的小哥哥小姐姐们</span>~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">不知道从什么开始喜欢上了他们，喜欢他们包含了满满爱意的歌曲，喜欢他们激情四射的舞蹈，喜欢看他们在舞台上挥洒汗水。或许一开始只是因为一个人，慢慢的喜欢上了他，想要更多的了解他，他的笑，他的泪水，他的故事。。。他所给我们带来的感动，对梦想的执着激励着我们努力向前。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">谁说他只是虚拟的存在！他明明一直都在我们心里。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">在你心里肯定有这样一个二次元偶像，那么现在就来告诉萌热娘他是谁吧！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><img 16px">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、&nbsp;围绕&nbsp;“二次元偶像”投稿，这次投稿有不一样的要求哦！希望大家仔细阅读~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><span style="line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240); font-family: 宋体;">本次任务投稿限定</span><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 112, 192); font-family: 宋体;">以下范围中的任意角色</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，范围之外的作品，最终所得票数不计入结果统计</span>~大家注意啦！</span></span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">投稿作品范围：</span></strong></span></p><p>（1）《LoveLive! School idol project》</p><p>（2）《VOCALOID虚拟歌手》</p><p>（3）《歌之王子殿下》</p><p>（4）《偶像大师》</p><p>（5）《月歌》</p><p>（6）《超级索尼子》</p><p>（7）《IDOLiSH7》</p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、&nbsp;内容/形式：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">图片&amp;文字投稿，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(112, 48, 160);">原创同人，动画/漫画原作截图，官方图片，COS照片，周边图片</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">等，在本次活动投稿作品限定范围内皆可。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、&nbsp;注意事项：</span></p><p 16px;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: 宋体;">（</span>2）希望你们在投稿时</span><strong><span style="font-size: 16px; color: rgb(255, 41, 101); letter-spacing: 0px; font-family: 宋体;">标注作品及角色名。</span></strong></span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><span 16px;">ID最多可投三稿。</span></span></strong></span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><span title="" alt="4.jpg"/></span></strong></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);"></span></strong><br/></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(247, 150, 70);">偶像练习生奖：《偶像大师灰姑娘女孩》 双叶杏 吊你玩 防尘塞挂件</span></strong></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="color: rgb(247, 150, 70);"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;"></span></strong></span><br/></p><p><br/></p>/am/storage/files/<p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">月黑风高的夜晚，风在耳边呼啸，远处不断传来</span><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-size: 16px;">狼群的吼叫</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">。突然头顶飞过一群黑影！你不禁抓紧了</span><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-size: 16px;">斗篷</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">，加快了脚步，诡异的笑声不时的从身后传来，不敢回头，只能不顾一切的往前冲。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">终于，你来到了一个挂着</span><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-size: 16px;">南瓜灯</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的房子前，努力的调整自己的心情与表情，你来这里只有一个目的你非常的清楚。咚咚咚，敲了三下门。吱呀</span>~破旧的木门缓缓的打开，即使隔着大大的帽子你也十分清楚面前的人的惊恐。呵，你抑制不住自己的兴奋，咧开嘴笑了笑，抬起头看着面前的人，缓缓的开口道：“</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)">Trick or treat</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)"><span style="font-family:宋体">？</span></span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">”</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">面前的人看了你一眼，不屑地说道：</span>“我只需要</span><span style="font-size: 16px;"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240); font-family: 宋体;">脑洞</span></strong></span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">，给我你的脑洞就给糖</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">。</span>”</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">没错！这个人就是萌热娘</span><span style="font-family: Arial;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(17, 17, 17);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 13px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)">&nbsp;*★,°*:.☆\(<span style="font-family:宋体">￣</span><span style="font-family:Arial">▽</span><span style="font-family:宋体">￣</span><span style="font-family:Arial">)/$:*.°★*</span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(112, 48, 160);font-size: 19px"><span style="font-family:宋体">只要你提供脑洞，设计万圣节装备，何止糖果，周边什么给你给你都给你！</span></span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">不给脑洞的话，嘿嘿嘿，小心萌热娘来捣乱哦！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;<img title="" alt="750x360.jpg" 16px">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">围绕</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">“</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">万圣节</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">”进行装备的设计并投稿，万圣节元素很多哦！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">南瓜，小女巫，小骷髅，吸血鬼，小恶魔，黑猫，斗篷，魔法</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">等等，只要和万圣节相关的装备设计都可以投稿哦！</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">2、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">内容</span>/形式</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，你可以选择手绘、板绘、</span>photoshop</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">等，彩色黑白都</span>OK，但</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">确保你的作品完全原创，不涉及他人的任何作品与创意。</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">☆萌热娘友情提示：将你的设计灵感标注在图稿上会更加分哟~☆</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">3、注意事项：</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请确保你的作品完全由个人原创，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>2）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请勿一稿多投。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">图稿都必须</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">积极、健康、向上</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">。如果发现有需要</span>“哔--”的内容萌热娘会进行删除哦~</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>4）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">与万圣节主题无关的设计投稿，投票票数无效。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">5</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">每个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">）最终解释权归萌热</span>APP所有。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">、投稿时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">10</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">21</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">6</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">日</span></p><p 宋体;">分别对应</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">票数最高的前三个投稿作品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">三</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">个作品的投稿者将获得对应奖品</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">另设有</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">萌萌小装备奖</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">由萌热娘选出，送给那些有潜力，有热情的作品，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">三个</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">作品的投稿者获得。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">围绕</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">“</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">套路故事</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">等等，把你心中的浪漫画出来吧~</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">2、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">内容</span>/形式</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，你可以选择手绘、板绘、</span>photoshop</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">等，彩色黑白都</span>OK，但</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">确保你的作品完全原创，不涉及他人的任何作品与创意。</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">☆萌热娘友情提示：将你的设计灵感标注在图稿上会更加分哟~☆</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">3、注意事项：</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请确保你的作品完全由个人原创，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>2）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请勿一稿多投。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">图稿都必须</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">积极、健康、向上</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">。如果发现有需要</span>“哔--”的内容萌热娘会进行删除哦~</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">二次元撩妹</span>/撩汉</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">主题无关的设计投稿，投票票数无效。</span></p><p 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">每个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">）最终解释权归萌热</span>APP所有。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">冬天最幸福的事情是什么，当然是宅在家里补番追剧看电影啦，比宅家补番更愉快的事情是什么，大概只有吃着零食看电影了吧</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;⁄(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)⁄. &nbsp;</span></p><p rgb(227, 108, 9);">补番的时候来点炸鸡配啤酒、看电影也可以搭配懒人椅、追剧别忘了抱只暖手宝......</span></strong><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">让你的补番时光更愉悦！</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(227, 108, 9);font-size: 16px">你可以设计一个多功能零食杯，也可以画一张懒人吊床的设计图，</span></strong><strong><span style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">征集规则（</span></strong><strong 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">补番追剧看电影时可以用到的二次元装备吧，</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">记得我们的关键词是</span><strong><span style="font-family: 0);">次元”</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">和</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 0, style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">2、内容/形式</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">请以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">手绘、板绘、</span>PS等作品</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">均可参</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">加。</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">来自萌热娘的爱心小提示：觉得自己的设计不够二次元？可以尝试在设计的</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">边边角角增加一些二次元元素哦</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">≖‿≖✧</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">当然，我们更希望看见的还是本身就很二次元的创意设计啦！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">3、注意事项：</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体">（1）</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">请确保你的作品由个人原创。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; text-indent: 32px;">（萌热娘超·友情提示：</span><strong><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; text-indent: 32px;">希望大家可以给自己的原创作品加上说明并标注署名~</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; text-indent: 32px;">据说可以收获更多的票数哟！）</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px">（2）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">将你的设计灵感备注在作品上，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">可以让大家更快地理解你的创意</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">&gt;ㅂ&lt;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的作品都是严厉禁止的哟</span>~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>4）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">每个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>5）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">、投稿时间：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">11月15日-12月5日</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">5</span><span style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">日</span>-</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">9</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">日</span></p><p style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">12月10日-12月20日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 9);">12</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">月</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">21</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">另设有</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">萌新小药王奖</span></strong><span 16px">三个</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">作品的投稿者获得。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">围绕</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">“</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">二次元动物</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">”进行设计并投稿，可以是动物相关的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">周边设计</span></strong><span style="line-height: font-family: 宋体;">，二次元角色的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">兽化</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，自家</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">爱宠的日常小漫画，</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">不怕脑洞大就怕不够大~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">2、</span><span style="font-family: style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，你可以选择手绘、板绘、</span>photoshop</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">等，彩色黑白都</span>OK，但</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">确保你的作品完全原创，不涉及他人的任何作品与创意。</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style="margin: 5px 0px; text-indent: 0px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left;"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">☆萌热娘友情提示：将你的设计灵感</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">和原创</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">标注在图稿上会更加分哟</span>~</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">原创的宝宝们在投稿时要大声告诉萌热娘，直接在作品上标注最好啦</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">☆</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">3、注意事项：</span></p><p style="margin: 5px 0px; text-indent: 0px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">（1）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 80, 77); letter-spacing: 0px;">请确保你的作品完全由个人原创，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">。</span></p><p style="margin: 5px 0px; text-indent: 0px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">（2）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 80, 77); letter-spacing: 0px;">请勿一稿多投。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">图稿都必须</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">积极、健康、向上</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">。</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">如果发现有需要</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">“哔--”的内容萌热娘会进行删除哦~</span></p><p style="margin: 5px 0px; text-indent: 0px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>4）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">与</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">二次元动物</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">主题无关的设计投稿，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">投票票数无</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; letter-spacing: 0px;">效。</span></p><p style="margin: 5px 0px; text-indent: 0px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">5</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">每个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="margin: 5px 0px; text-indent: 0px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">）最终解释权归萌热</span>APP所有。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">4、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">投稿时间：</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">12</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">月</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">1</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">日-</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">12</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">月</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">23</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">日</span><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">5、投票时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">12月24日-1月2日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">票数统计结果将于</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">1</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">月</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">3</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">日</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">公布</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">活动共设</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">三个人气奖项</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">分别对应</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">票数最高的前三个投稿作品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">三</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">个作品的投稿者将获得对应奖品</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。</span><br/></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">本次特殊奖项：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">动物园园长奖，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">由萌热动物协会特别颁发！</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">萌热娘也会选出</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">三个</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">送给那些有潜力，有热情的作品，投稿者获得</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">最佳饲养员奖</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span letter-spacing: 0px;">快来变身小动物，一起肆意卖萌吧</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0px;">~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">一群温柔可爱的人、一些缤纷甜美的小裙子、一点强大而神秘的魔法，一个</span>“绝对没问题”的故事......</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">圣诞是白色的，你的少女心冒着粉红的泡泡，你喜欢魔卡少女樱吗？</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">你想为你的童年送上一份礼物吗？</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"></span></p><p 16px">你想缔结一个关于爱的契约吗？</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"></span></p><p 16px">☆☆☆以下是重点的分割线☆☆☆</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">以礼物之名缔结契约！你可以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">为魔卡少女樱中的角色送上一份暖萌的心意</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">，也可以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">召唤基友来互换礼物</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">，完成爱的契约！据说此次任务的形式更有趣，奖品更丰富，还不快随萌热娘一起一探究竟，相信你也一定会想参加哒！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 16px">征集规则（</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">请</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">认真阅读</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">哟</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">1、&nbsp;</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">参与方式：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; 240);">给</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">你的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">送礼物</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，一旦</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">收到回赠</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">圣诞CP即刻</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">达成！</span></strong></p><p 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)"><span style="font-family:宋体">请为你的投稿作品注明赠送对象，回赠的宝宝也要记得召唤好基友哟</span>~</span><span letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 150%; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">“送给XXX”就可以了哟~）</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 14px"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">☆圣诞CP达成后，CP中有一人获奖即可点亮</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">幸运</span>CP属性，未获奖的一方也将收获神秘</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">礼物；</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">CP中两人均获奖可点亮锦鲤CP属性，两位在收获任务奖品外，还将分别get一份</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); line-height: 150%;">神秘奖品！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>2）没有CP的宝宝也可以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">给《魔卡少女樱》这部作品或者其中的角色赠送礼</span></strong><strong style="font-family: Arial; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(17, 17, 17); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">\(•<span style="font-family:宋体">ㅂ</span>•)/♥</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; text-indent: 32px;">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">2、内容/形式：</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）此次任务为《魔卡少女樱》主题任务，请大家</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">围绕《魔卡少女樱》这部作</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">设计你的礼物哟~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px">（2）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">作品形式不限</span><span style="font-family: Arial;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(17, 17, 17);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)">(●&#39;◡&#39;●)</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">你的礼物可以是你</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">亲手绘制的周边设计图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">：粉粉</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">嫩嫩的各类饰品、充满圣诞气息的围巾手套、冬日必备的水杯暖手捂</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">......</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">也可以是一篇</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">同人文</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、一份</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">表白</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、一则</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">小段子</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。当然，毛毡粘土等</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">手工类</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">作品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、自制</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">视频</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">COS</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">等</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">有创意的形式</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">我们也全部接收！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 14px"><span style="font-family:宋体">萌热娘小教学：同人文、视频等作品无法以图片的形式投稿怎么办？别着急，移步孵化箱，</span></span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 150%;">将你的作品通过帖子发出来，萌热娘会以最快的速度将它们转移至投稿栏哟</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 150%;">~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">3、注意事项：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">请确保你的作品由个人原创。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px">（2）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">据说</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">在你的原创作品上标注作者署名并加上灵感说明</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">，会收获更多票数哟</span>~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的作品都是严厉禁止</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">哒！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>4）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">每个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>5）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">一份礼物只可以送给一位基友。</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">不符合规定的作品无法达成圣诞</span>CP哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>6）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">、投稿时间：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">12月11日-1月3日</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">5</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">、投票时间：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">1月4日-1月11日</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 80, 77);">&nbsp;</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">票数统计结果将于</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">1月12日</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">公布</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">本次活动设</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">一、二、三等奖</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">三</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">个奖项，</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">投票选出，分别对应票数最高的三个投稿作品。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">特殊奖项——</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">“圣诞魔法师奖”一名，由萌热娘特别颁发。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px"></span>3、<strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">此外，投票也有奖品可以拿啦！</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">参与任务投票，在评论中留下你投票的作品，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">任务结束后，我们将在这些小伙伴中随机选取</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">三位</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">幸运宝宝，送上精美礼物！</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">只需动动手指，就有机会</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">get奖品，你是不是敲心动呢~</span></p><p border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">2、内容/形式：</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）你最喜欢的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人宝宝</span></strong>，你心目中的<strong style="box-sizing: box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）亲手设计一个<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人宝宝的周边</span></strong>吧！随身携带的小包、保温杯，冬天必</span><span style="font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">备的手套、围巾......萌热娘最喜欢原创设计啦！</span></p><p rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人粘土</span></strong>。听起来很厉害的样子，萌热娘期待看到这样有才华的作品哦<span style="font-size: 14px; box-sizing: border-box;">罒ω罒&nbsp;</span></span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人四格漫画</span></strong>。记录下这个冬天你与雪人宝宝发生的故事吧~</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）外面下雪了，如果你<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">堆了一个二次元的雪人宝宝（雪人宝宝需要是动漫人物等二次元形象哦~）</span></strong>，请一定要拍下来分享给</span><span style="font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">萌热的小伙伴！</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;"></span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">怎么样，形式是不是敲·丰富！除了以上这些，萌热娘也欢迎<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">其它有创意的形式</span></strong>哦~</span></p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="padding-left: 19px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="line-height: 1.9; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">3、注意事项：</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">请确保你的作品由个人原创</span></strong>。涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（萌热娘超·友情提示：<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">希望大家可以给自己的原创作品加上说明并标注署<span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">名</span></span></strong><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">~据说可以收获更多的票数哟！）</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）据说<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">将你的设计灵感备注在作品上</span></strong>，可以让大家更快地理解你的创意哦。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong>的作品都是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">严厉禁止</span></strong>的哟~</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）与“<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">二次元的雪人宝宝</span></strong>”主题无关的投稿作品，投票票数无效。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）每个ID<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">最多可投三稿</span></strong>。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（6）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" border-box;">每个星座的幸运石、恋人送的平安符、朋友手工制作的可爱挂件，哪一个是你想要的幸运物呢？</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: style="color: rgb(255, 129, 36); box-sizing: border-box;">欧气横飞的小道具</span>，把身边朋友的<span style="color: rgb(255, 129, 36); box-sizing: border-box;">好运经历画成四格漫画</span>沾沾欧气等等都可以，让你的幸运不断UP吧！</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">也把二次元的祝福送给家人、送给基友，送给我们的2017年。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section 1em; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(214, 51, 60); border-right-width: 1em; border-right-style: solid; border-right-color: rgb(214, 51, 60); border-bottom-width: 1em !important; powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="margin: 5px 0% 0px; position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="text-align: justify; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.9; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">内容/形式：</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">给春节加点二次元，你会怎么做呢？<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">画一幅喜庆的本命年画，</span></strong>贴在卧室最显眼的地方；<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">福贴上面涂个Q版男（女）神，</span></strong>拍在大门上。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）剪纸是门艺术，<span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">把喜欢的角色剪出来，</strong></span>做窗花、做装饰，<span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">或者来点毛毡、粘土、贺卡等手工，</strong></span>一定格外吸引眼球。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）设计一副<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">二次元春联</span></strong>，让2017与众不同。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）春节元素敲丰富！<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">烟花、炮竹、红包、舞龙......将这些元素与二次元糅合在一起，设计一份独一无二的春节贺礼，</span></strong>绝壁会大受欢迎。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）当然，<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">其它创意形式、</span></strong>你随手拍到的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">充满二次元气息的春节元素</span></strong>、你心目中最棒的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">二次元春节图片</span></strong>，我们也全部接收！</p></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="height: 0.5em; width: 2em; border-left-width: 1em; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(214, 51, 60); border-right-width: 1em; border-right-style: solid; border-right-color: border-box;"><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="margin: 5px 0% 0px; position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="text-align: justify; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.9; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">注意事项：</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">请勿抄袭请勿盗用！请确保你的作品由个人原创！</span></strong>违规的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">原创作品请记得加上说明并标注署名哦~</span></strong>据说获奖几率会大大提升！）</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">将你的设计灵感备注在作品上，</span></strong>可以让大家更快地理解你的创意哦。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">黄色、暴力、引战</span></strong>等带有<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">不和谐</span></strong>元素的作品都是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">严厉禁止</span></strong>的哟~</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">与“二次元”&amp;“春节”主题无关</span></strong>的投稿作品，投票票数<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">无效</span></strong>。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">每个ID</span></strong>最多可投<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">三稿</span></strong>。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（6）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</p></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="font-size: 15px; color: rgb(75, 101, 98); line-height: 2; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">2、内容/形式：</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">让我们从赏灯大会的开始说起๑乛◡乛๑</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">设计一身赏灯大会专用服装</span></strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">，</span></strong>让你变身现场最美腻的小公举。<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）提起灯笼你能想到几种参与方式？<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">画一只独一无二的灯笼设计图、涂一个可以印在灯笼上的本命、亲手制作一个特别的灯</span></strong><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">笼</strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">......</strong></span>萌热娘期待你们的作品哦~</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">灯谜</span></strong><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">！</strong></span>是时候展现泥萌的智慧啦。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）吃汤圆、赏明月......<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">赏灯</span></strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">大会上出现的元素</span></strong>都可以参与投稿哦~</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）萌热娘最喜欢听故事啦~<span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">关于赏灯大会的传说、习俗</strong>......</span>一定要说给萌热娘听哟=w=</p><p style="clear: border-box;">其它创意形式</span></strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">。</span></strong>只要你能想到并且你的作品符合主题，我们都热情欢迎！</p></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" vertical-align: top; width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box;"><section style="display: inline-block; float: left; width: 1em; height: 1em; margin: 1.5em 0px -2em -0.5em; border: 1px solid rgb(232, 162, 66); border-radius: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(254, 255, 255);"></section><section style="border-left-width: 1px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(232, 162, 66); style="padding: 0px 0px 0px 15px; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="margin: 0px 0%; position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="font-size: 15px; color: rgb(75, 101, 98); line-height: 2; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">3、注意事项：</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">请勿抄袭请勿盗用！</span></strong>请确保你的作品由个人原创！违规的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">原创作品请记得加上说明并标注署名哦~</span></strong>据说获奖几率会大大提升！）</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">将你的设计灵感备注在作品上，</span></strong>可以让大家更快地理解你的创意哦。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong>的作品都是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">严厉禁止</span></strong>的哟~</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">与“二次元”&amp;“赏灯大会”主题无关</span></strong>的投稿作品，投票票数<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">无效</span></strong>。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">每个ID</span></strong>最多可投<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">三稿</span></strong>。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（6）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</p></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">笔、本子、橡皮、直尺、书签、笔袋、胶带、文件夹......</strong></span>只要是你亲手设计的二次元文具周边，我们都热情欢迎。<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）本次任务的投稿作品只能是<span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">图稿</strong></span>哦~手绘、板绘、鼠绘、PS等形式不限。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="display: inline-block; width: 100%; border: 10px; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">3、注意事项：</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">萌热娘拒绝的作品(,,Ծ‸Ծ,,)：</span></strong></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）盗用或涉嫌抄袭。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）带有黄色、暴力、引战等不和谐元素。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）与“二次元文具”主题无关。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）超过“每个ID最多可投三稿”的规定数额。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">（1）添加了原创说明及署名。<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）增加了作者的创作灵感。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" border-box;"/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">投稿规则：</strong></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">1、&nbsp;围绕<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">宇宙/星球</span></strong>的主题进行设计并投稿，内容不限：<span style="color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">道具、武器、外星形象、萌物、服装、生活用品、飞船机甲</span>等等……</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">只要有<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">宇宙元素</span></strong>或者充满<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">未来感</span></strong>的设计都可以~</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">2、请以<span style="color: rgb(101, 203, 252); box-sizing: border-box;">图稿或照片</span>的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，你可以选择<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">任意<span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">形式</span></strong><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">，例如：</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">手绘、板绘、photoshop，黏土、折纸、羊毛毡等等…只要内容符合主题就行啦！</span></p><p style="text-align: center; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(160, 160, 160); font-size: 12px; box-sizing: border-box;">☆萌热娘友情提示：将设计灵感标注在图稿上会更加分哟~原创的宝宝们也要在投稿时要大声告诉萌热娘☆</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）请确保你的作品<span style="color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">完全由本人创作</span>，涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。我们欢迎所有有创意的形式，<span style="text-decoration: underline; box-sizing: border-box;">无论是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">临摹</strong>、<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">同人</strong>还是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">完全原创</strong>的作品都请在投稿时备注说明哦！</span>没有备注的作品将有被删除的可能性哦！投稿时一定要注意啦~</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）图稿都必须积极、健康、向上。<span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">每个ID最多可投<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">三</strong>稿</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">。并且与“宇宙”主题无关的设计投稿，投票票数无效。</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; border-box;"/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp; &nbsp; 投票时间：<span style="color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">个投稿作品，投稿者将获得对应奖品。</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">利用手边使用过的材料，发挥无限想象力，进行<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(27, 170, 239, 0.921569); box-sizing: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">画出你心中的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(27, 170, 239, 0.921569); box-sizing: 170, 239, 0.921569); box-sizing: border-box;">独特的植物</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: rgb(142, 201, 101); box-sizing: border-box;">环保+二次元</span></strong>有关的想法都用图稿的形式告诉萌热娘吧（●&gt;∀&lt;●）</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" class="" style="margin-bottom: 0.5em; line-height: 10px; transform: translate3d(17px, 0px, 0px); -webkit-transform: translate3d(17px, 0px, 0px); -moz-transform: translate3d(17px, 0px, 0px); padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">请以<span style="color: rgb(242, 104, 153); box-sizing: border-box;">图稿或照片</span>的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，你可以选择手绘、板绘、photoshop，黏土、折纸、羊毛毡等各种手工形式，彩色黑白都OK，但<strong
