style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">21</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">日</span>-</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">11</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">6</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">5、投票时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">11月7日-11月16日</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">票数统计结果将于</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">11</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">月</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">17</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">日</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">公布</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">活动共设</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">三个奖项</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">分别对应</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">票数最高的前三个投稿作品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">三</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">个作品的投稿者将获得对应奖品</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">另设有</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">萌萌小装备奖</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">由萌热娘选出，送给那些有潜力，有热情的作品，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">三个</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">作品的投稿者获得。</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">奖品看这里这里哟</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">o( =•ω•= )m</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（要认真阅读哦）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">围绕</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">“</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">互动</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">（CP之间），分享自己的或者身边人的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">套路故事</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">等等，把你心中的浪漫画出来吧~</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">2、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">内容</span>/形式</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，你可以选择手绘、板绘、</span>photoshop</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">等，彩色黑白都</span>OK，但</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">确保你的作品完全原创，不涉及他人的任何作品与创意。</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">☆萌热娘友情提示：将你的设计灵感标注在图稿上会更加分哟~☆</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">3、注意事项：</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请确保你的作品完全由个人原创，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>2）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请勿一稿多投。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">图稿都必须</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">积极、健康、向上</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">。如果发现有需要</span>“哔--”的内容萌热娘会进行删除哦~</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>4）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">与</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">二次元撩妹</span>/撩汉</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">主题无关的设计投稿，投票票数无效。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">5</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(192, 80, 77);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">每个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">）最终解释权归萌热</span>APP所有。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">、投稿时间：</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">11</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">1</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">日</span>-</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">11</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">月</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">15</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px">日</span></p><p </span></strong></p><p><br/></p><p style="white-space: normal; line-height: 24px;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">快来参加征集，就算没有脱单，把</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(255, 0, 宋体;">o(*≧▽≦)ツ</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">十五的月亮格外圆，我补的老番更好看，为什么，因为我有神奇的补番装备啊！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">冬天最幸福的事情是什么，当然是宅在家里补番追剧看电影啦，比宅家补番更愉快的事情是什么，大概只有吃着零食看电影了吧</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;⁄(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)⁄. &nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">丰富点，快活的形式丰富点，复杂点，补番的过程复杂点。</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">补番的时候来点炸鸡配啤酒、看电影也可以搭配懒人椅、追剧别忘了抱只暖手宝......</span></strong><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">让你的补番时光更愉悦！</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(227, 108, 9);font-size: 16px">你可以设计一个多功能零食杯，也可以画一张懒人吊床的设计图，</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">所有能够增加补番幸福感的作品我们全部接收！</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">征集规则（</span></strong><strong 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">补番追剧看电影时可以用到的二次元装备吧，</span></strong><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">记得我们的关键词是</span><strong><span style="font-family: 0);">次元”</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">和</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 0, style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">2、内容/形式</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">请以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">手绘、板绘、</span>PS等作品</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">均可参</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">加。</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">来自萌热娘的爱心小提示：觉得自己的设计不够二次元？可以尝试在设计的</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">边边角角增加一些二次元元素哦</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">≖‿≖✧</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">当然，我们更希望看见的还是本身就很二次元的创意设计啦！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">3、注意事项：</span></p><p color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">请确保你的作品由个人原创。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</span></p><p 16px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);">将你的设计灵感备注在作品上，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">可以让大家更快地理解你的创意</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">&gt;ㅂ&lt;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;color:rgb(227,108,9);font-size:16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">票数统计结果将于</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">1</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);">月</span><span style="line-height: 150%; style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">活动共设</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">三个人气奖项</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">分别对应</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(255, 0, 102);">票数最高的前三个投稿作品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">三</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">个作品的投稿者将获得对应奖品</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。</span><br/></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">本次特殊奖项：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">动物园园长奖，</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">由萌热动物协会特别颁发！</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">萌热娘也会选出</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">三个</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">送给那些有潜力，有热情的作品，投稿者获得</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(255, 0, 102);font-size: 16px">最佳饲养员奖</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">。</span></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style="margin: 5px 0px; text-indent: 0px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left;"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">☆</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">请各位获奖的宝宝们在一周内领走奖品哦</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px">☆</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top:5px;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:5px;margin-left:0;text-indent:0;line-height:24px"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;color: rgb(253, 173, 1);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></strong></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">3、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">奖品看这里这里哟</span><span 25);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px"></span></p><p style="white-space: normal;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(219, 125, 25); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><img 微软雅黑;color: rgb(219, 125, 25);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px"><br/></span><br/></p><p><span style=";font-family:宋体;font-size:14px">&nbsp;</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑;color: rgb(219, 125, 25);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8xMS8zMC8wMDAy!!567c6e9c261241a18f124dcb4a1b82c0.jpg" title="" alt="奖品4.jpg"/>&nbsp;</span></strong><strong><span 102);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px">最佳饲养员奖：</span></strong><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(255, 0, 102); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;">非人哉-手机挂绳</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(255, 0, 102); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px;"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0px;">快来变身小动物，一起肆意卖萌吧</span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0px;">~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">一群温柔可爱的人、一些缤纷甜美的小裙子、一点强大而神秘的魔法，一个</span>“绝对没问题”的故事......</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">圣诞是白色的，你的少女心冒着粉红的泡泡，你喜欢魔卡少女樱吗？</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">你想为你的童年送上一份礼物吗？</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">☆☆☆萌萌的分割线☆☆☆</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">樱狼是我吃过最甜的</span>CP，桃矢X雪兔萌到不行\(//∇//)\圣诞他们在互换礼物，冷冷的狗粮在脸上胡乱的拍，</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">你想缔结一个关于爱的契约吗？</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(0, 176, 240);font-size: 16px">☆☆☆以下是重点的分割线☆☆☆</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">以礼物之名缔结契约！你可以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">为魔卡少女樱中的角色送上一份暖萌的心意</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">，也可以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">召唤基友来互换礼物</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">，完成爱的契约！据说此次任务的形式更有趣，奖品更丰富，还不快随萌热娘一起一探究竟，相信你也一定会想参加哒！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><br/></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><img src="FLSMjAxNi8xMi8wOS8wMDA3!!60e0fe68e40b40e799eda5fe72f47d55.jpg" title="" alt="750X360.jpg"/></span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">征集规则（</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">请</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">认真阅读</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">哟</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">）：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:宋体;font-size:16px">1、&nbsp;</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">参与方式：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">互赠礼物缔结契约！</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">给</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">你的</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">好基友</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">赠</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">送礼物</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，一旦</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">收到回赠</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">圣诞CP即刻</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(0, 176, 240);">达成！</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 14px"><span style="font-family:宋体">萌热娘超</span>·温馨提示：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 14px">☆</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)"><span style="font-family:宋体">请为你的投稿作品注明赠送对象，回赠的宝宝也要记得召唤好基友哟</span>~</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 150%;">（作品名称处直接标注</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 150%; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">“送给XXX”就可以了哟~）</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 14px"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px">☆圣诞CP达成后，CP中有一人获奖即可点亮</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">幸运</span>CP属性，未获奖的一方也将收获神秘</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">礼物；</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">CP中两人均获奖可点亮锦鲤CP属性，两位在收获任务奖品外，还将分别get一份</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(192, 0, 0); line-height: 150%;">神秘奖品！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>2）没有CP的宝宝也可以</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">给《魔卡少女樱》这部作品或者其中的角色赠送礼</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">物</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">哟</span><span style="font-family: Arial; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(17, 17, 17); letter-spacing: 0px; font-size: 14px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);">\(•<span style="font-family:宋体">ㅂ</span>•)/♥</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; text-indent: 32px;">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">2、内容/形式：</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）此次任务为《魔卡少女樱》主题任务，请大家</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">围绕《魔卡少女樱》这部作</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">设计你的礼物哟~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px">（2）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">作品形式不限</span><span style="font-family: Arial;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(17, 17, 17);letter-spacing: 0;font-size: 14px;background: rgb(255, 255, 255)">(●&#39;◡&#39;●)</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">你的礼物可以是你</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">亲手绘制的周边设计图稿</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">：粉粉</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">嫩嫩的各类饰品、充满圣诞气息的围巾手套、冬日必备的水杯暖手捂</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">......</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">也可以是一篇</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">同人文</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、一份</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">表白</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、一则</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">小段子</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。当然，毛毡粘土等</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">手工类</span></strong><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">作品</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、自制</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">视频</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">、</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">COS</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">等</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">有创意的形式</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">我们也全部接收！</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(192, 0, 0);font-size: 14px"><span style="font-family:宋体">萌热娘小教学：同人文、视频等作品无法以图片的形式投稿怎么办？别着急，移步孵化箱，</span></span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 150%;">将你的作品通过帖子发出来，萌热娘会以最快的速度将它们转移至投稿栏哟</span><span style="color: rgb(192, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 150%;">~</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%;">&nbsp;</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">3、注意事项：</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>1）</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">请确保你的作品由个人原创。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</span></p><p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px">（2）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">据说</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">在你的原创作品上标注作者署名并加上灵感说明</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">，会收获更多票数哟</span>~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>3）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">的作品都是严厉禁止</span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">哒！</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>4）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">每个</span>ID最多可投三稿。</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>5）</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">一份礼物只可以送给一位基友。</span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">不符合规定的作品无法达成圣诞</span>CP哦~</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px"><span style="font-family:宋体">（</span>6）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><br/></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">4</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">、投稿时间：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">12月11日-1月3日</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">5</span><span style=";font-family:宋体;line-height:150%;font-size:16px">、投票时间：</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;color: rgb(250, 125, 178);font-size: 16px">1月4日-1月11日</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(192, 80, 77);">&nbsp;</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;line-height: 150%;font-size: 16px">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">1、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">票数统计结果将于</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">1月12日</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">公布</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">2、</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">本次活动设</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">一、二、三等奖</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">三</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">个奖项，</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">投票选出，分别对应票数最高的三个投稿作品。</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">特殊奖项——</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">“圣诞魔法师奖”一名，由萌热娘特别颁发。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 16px"></span>3、<strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">此外，投票也有奖品可以拿啦！</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">参与任务投票，在评论中留下你投票的作品，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">任务结束后，我们将在这些小伙伴中随机选取</span><strong style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; line-height: 150%; color: rgb(250, 125, 178);">三位</span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">幸运宝宝，送上精美礼物！</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">只需动动手指，就有机会</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">get奖品，你是不是敲心动呢~</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">4、&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">丰厚</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">礼品</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">看这边o( =•ω•= )m</span></p><p style=";line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"><br/></span></p><p border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">2、内容/形式：</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）你最喜欢的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人宝宝</span></strong>，你心目中的<strong style="box-sizing: box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）亲手设计一个<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人宝宝的周边</span></strong>吧！随身携带的小包、保温杯，冬天必</span><span style="font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">备的手套、围巾......萌热娘最喜欢原创设计啦！</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人粘土</span></strong>。听起来很厉害的样子，萌热娘期待看到这样有才华的作品哦<span style="font-size: 14px; box-sizing: border-box;">罒ω罒&nbsp;</span></span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">雪人四格漫画</span></strong>。记录下这个冬天你与雪人宝宝发生的故事吧~</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）外面下雪了，如果你<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(104, 178, 232); box-sizing: border-box;">堆了一个二次元的雪人宝宝（雪人宝宝需要是动漫人物等二次元形象哦~）</span></strong>，请一定要拍下来分享给</span><span style="font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">萌热的小伙伴！</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;"></span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box;">怎么样，形式是不是敲·丰富！除了以上这些，萌热娘也欢迎<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">其它有创意的形式</span></strong>哦~</span></p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section border-box;">请确保你的作品由个人原创</span></strong>。涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（萌热娘超·友情提示：<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">希望大家可以给自己的原创作品加上说明并标注署<span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">名</span></span></strong><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">~据说可以收获更多的票数哟！）</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）据说<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">将你的设计灵感备注在作品上</span></strong>，可以让大家更快地理解你的创意哦。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong>的作品都是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">严厉禁止</span></strong>的哟~</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）与“<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">二次元的雪人宝宝</span></strong>”主题无关的投稿作品，投票票数无效。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）每个ID<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 109, 109); box-sizing: border-box;">最多可投三稿</span></strong>。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（6）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" 129, 36); box-sizing: border-box;">幸运物</span>”进行设计并投稿。</strong></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">每个星座的幸运石、恋人送的平安符、朋友手工制作的可爱挂件，哪一个是你想要的幸运物呢？</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">如果有那么一个<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 129, 36); box-sizing: border-box;">神奇的幸运物</span></strong>可以让你实现心愿，那么就把它画出来吧！</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">设计一个能让自己<span style="color: rgb(255, 129, 36); box-sizing: border-box;">欧气横飞的小道具</span>，把身边朋友的<span style="color: rgb(255, 129, 36); box-sizing: border-box;">好运经历画成四格漫画</span>沾沾欧气等等都可以，让你的幸运不断UP吧！</p><p powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="margin: 5px 0% 0px; position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="text-align: justify; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.9; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">内容/形式：</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">给春节加点二次元，你会怎么做呢？<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">画一幅喜庆的本命年画，</span></strong>贴在卧室最显眼的地方；<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">福贴上面涂个Q版男（女）神，</span></strong>拍在大门上。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）剪纸是门艺术，<span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">把喜欢的角色剪出来，</strong></span>做窗花、做装饰，<span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">或者来点毛毡、粘土、贺卡等手工，</strong></span>一定格外吸引眼球。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）设计一副<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">二次元春联</span></strong>，让2017与众不同。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）春节元素敲丰富！<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgba(169, 155, 55, 0.952941); box-sizing: border-box;">烟花、炮竹、红包、舞龙......将这些元素与二次元糅合在一起，设计一份独一无二的春节贺礼，</span></strong>绝壁会大受欢迎。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）当然，<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">其它创意形式、</span></strong>你随手拍到的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">充满二次元气息的春节元素</span></strong>、你心目中最棒的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(202, 68, 53); box-sizing: border-box;">二次元春节图片</span></strong>，我们也全部接收！</p></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" 2; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">1、提起赏灯大会，你能想到什么？记得我们的关键词——<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">2、内容/形式：</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">让我们从赏灯大会的开始说起๑乛◡乛๑</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">设计一身赏灯大会专用服装</span></strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">，</span></strong>让你变身现场最美腻的小公举。<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）提起灯笼你能想到几种参与方式？<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">画一只独一无二的灯笼设计图、涂一个可以印在灯笼上的本命、亲手制作一个特别的灯</span></strong><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">笼</strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">......</strong></span>萌热娘期待你们的作品哦~</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">灯谜</span></strong><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">！</strong></span>是时候展现泥萌的智慧啦。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）吃汤圆、赏明月......<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">赏灯</span></strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">大会上出现的元素</span></strong>都可以参与投稿哦~</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）萌热娘最喜欢听故事啦~<span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">关于赏灯大会的传说、习俗</strong>......</span>一定要说给萌热娘听哟=w=</p><p style="clear: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">3、注意事项：</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">请勿抄袭请勿盗用！</span></strong>请确保你的作品由个人原创！违规的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">原创作品请记得加上说明并标注署名哦~</span></strong>据说获奖几率会大大提升！）</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">将你的设计灵感备注在作品上，</span></strong>可以让大家更快地理解你的创意哦。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">黄色、暴力、引战等带有不和谐元素</span></strong>的作品都是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">严厉禁止</span></strong>的哟~</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">与“二次元”&amp;“赏灯大会”主题无关</span></strong>的投稿作品，投票票数<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">无效</span></strong>。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（5）<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">每个ID</span></strong>最多可投<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(214, 25, 25); box-sizing: border-box;">三稿</span></strong>。</p><p style="clear: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（6）最终解释权归萌热APP所有。</p></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" border-box;">恋爱就像是橘子汽水，酸酸甜甜，脸红心跳的感觉。无论是单恋还是两情相悦，恋爱总是美好的，把这份美好呈现给大家吧~</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">把恋爱中的<span border-box;">笔袋、文件夹、纸胶带</span></strong>缺一不可，此外，我可能还会为你设计一点特别的东西。</p></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">1、相信大家都猜到这次任务的关键词了，没错，和萌热娘一起念，<span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: 10px; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">2、内容/形式：</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）<span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">笔、本子、橡皮、直尺、书签、笔袋、胶带、文件夹......</strong></span>只要是你亲手设计的二次元文具周边，我们都热情欢迎。<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）本次任务的投稿作品只能是<span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">图稿</strong></span>哦~手绘、板绘、鼠绘、PS等形式不限。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" powered-by="xiumi.us"><section class="" style="margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; position: static; box-sizing: border-box;"><section class="" style="display: inline-block; width: 100%; border: 10px; box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">3、注意事项：</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">萌热娘拒绝的作品(,,Ծ‸Ծ,,)：</span></strong></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）盗用或涉嫌抄袭。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）带有黄色、暴力、引战等不和谐元素。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（3）与“二次元文具”主题无关。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（4）超过“每个ID最多可投三稿”的规定数额。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 167, 0); box-sizing: border-box;">萌热娘喜欢的作品&lt;(▰˘◡˘▰)&gt;：<!--(▰˘◡˘▰)--><!--(▰˘◡˘▰)--><!--(▰˘◡˘▰)--></span></strong></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）添加了原创说明及署名。<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）增加了作者的创作灵感。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section><section class="Powered-by-XIUMI V5" style="position: static; box-sizing: border-box;" style="color: rgb(100, 100, 100); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box;">赶快翻开你的脑洞笔记本，写下、画出你的所想所见~无论是宇宙道具还是外星生物，未来服装又或者机甲飞船，萌热娘统统都会接收 ≧▽≦ margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">1、&nbsp;围绕<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">宇宙/星球</span></strong>的主题进行设计并投稿，内容不限：<span style="color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">道具、武器、外星形象、萌物、服装、生活用品、飞船机甲</span>等等……</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">只要有<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">宇宙元素</span></strong>或者充满<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">未来感</span></strong>的设计都可以~</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">2、请以<span style="color: rgb(101, 203, 252); box-sizing: border-box;">图稿或照片</span>的形式将你的设计与灵感展示出来，你可以选择<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">任意<span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">形式</span></strong><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">，例如：</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">手绘、板绘、photoshop，黏土、折纸、羊毛毡等等…只要内容符合主题就行啦！</span></p><p style="text-align: center; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(160, 160, 160); font-size: 12px; box-sizing: border-box;">☆萌热娘友情提示：将设计灵感标注在图稿上会更加分哟~原创的宝宝们也要在投稿时要大声告诉萌热娘☆</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">3、注意事项：</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（1）请确保你的作品<span style="color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">完全由本人创作</span>，涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。我们欢迎所有有创意的形式，<span style="text-decoration: underline; box-sizing: border-box;">无论是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">临摹</strong>、<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">同人</strong>还是<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">完全原创</strong>的作品都请在投稿时备注说明哦！</span>没有备注的作品将有被删除的可能性哦！投稿时一定要注意啦~</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">（2）图稿都必须积极、健康、向上。<span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">每个ID最多可投<strong style="box-sizing: border-box;">三</strong>稿</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">。并且与“宇宙”主题无关的设计投稿，投票票数无效。</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">4、投稿时间：<span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">2月21日-3月12日</span></span><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp; &nbsp; 投票时间：<span style="color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">3月13日-3月22日</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">奖品设置规则：</span></strong></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">1、&nbsp;票数统计结果将于</span><span style="color: rgb(95, 156, 239); box-sizing: border-box;">3月23日</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">公布</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">2、&nbsp;活动奖项如下：</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">人气奖 X 3</span></strong><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">，分别对应票数最高的</span><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box;">前3</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">个投稿作品，投稿者将获得对应奖品。</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><strong style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); box-sizing: border-box;">鼓励奖 X 2</span></strong><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">，萌热娘会一如既往地亲自挑选出</span><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box;">2位</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; box-sizing: border-box;">用心参与活动的宝宝⁄(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)⁄</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;"><strong border-box;">，这是本次活动特地新增设的奖项哦，额外送给</span><span style="color: rgb(166, 91, 203); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box;">2位有潜力的设计稿作品</span><span style="letter-spacing: 0px; line-height: 1.6; 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box;">1.<span style="color: rgba(27, 170, 239, 0.921569); box-sizing: border-box;">请确保你的作品完全由个人创作</span>，涉及抄袭的投稿作品将被取消参赛资格。</p><p style="white-space: normal; border-box;"><span style="color: rgb(142, 201, 101); box-sizing: border-box;">环保</span></strong>”主题无关的设计投稿，投票票数无效。</p><p style="white-space: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px;
